document.full_text: the north carolina company whose bus crashed on tuesday in virginia killing 4 and injuring 54 passengers was suspended from interstate travel, federal regulators said late on tuesday.
document.title: company from virginia bus crash taken off the road
lines_and_colors: the north carolina company whose bus crashed on tuesday in virginia killing 4 and injuring 54 passengers was suspended from interstate travel, federal regulators said late on tuesday.
